mapper.sql: T.ID AS "id", T.CREATE_DATE AS "createDate", T.CREATE_USER AS "createUser", T.UPDATE_DATE AS "updateDate", T.UPDATE_USER AS "updateUser", T.REMARKS AS "remarks", T.DEL_FLAG AS "delFlag", T.JOB_NAME AS "jobName", T.ALIAS_NAME AS "aliasName", T.JOB_GROUP AS "jobGroup", T.JOB_TRIGGER AS "jobTrigger", T.CRON_EXPRESSION AS "cronExpression", T.IS_SYNC AS "isSync", T.DESCRIPTION AS "description", T.STATUS AS "status", T.JOB_CLASS AS "jobClass", T.START_AT AS "startAt", T.END_AT AS "endAt"

sql.where:
1=1
AND T.CREATE_DATE = #{createDate}
AND T.CREATE_USER LIKE '%'||#{createUser}||'%'
AND T.UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate}
AND T.UPDATE_USER LIKE '%'||#{updateUser}||'%'
AND T.REMARKS LIKE '%'||#{remarks}||'%'
AND T.DEL_FLAG LIKE '%'||#{delFlag}||'%'
AND T.JOB_NAME LIKE '%'||#{jobName}||'%'
AND T.ALIAS_NAME LIKE '%'||#{aliasName}||'%'
AND T.JOB_GROUP LIKE '%'||#{jobGroup}||'%'
AND T.JOB_TRIGGER LIKE '%'||#{jobTrigger}||'%'
AND T.CRON_EXPRESSION LIKE '%'||#{cronExpression}||'%'
AND T.IS_SYNC LIKE '%'||#{isSync}||'%'
AND T.DESCRIPTION LIKE '%'||#{description}||'%'
AND T.STATUS LIKE '%'||#{status}||'%'
AND T.JOB_CLASS LIKE '%'||#{jobClass}||'%'
AND T.START_AT = #{startAt}
AND T.END_AT = #{endAt}

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) total FROM JOB_QUARTZ_CONF T

SELECT COUNT(1) total FROM JOB_QUARTZ_CONF T
AND T.ID != #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO JOB_QUARTZ_CONF (
REMARKS, DEL_FLAG, JOB_NAME, ALIAS_NAME, JOB_GROUP, JOB_TRIGGER, CRON_EXPRESSION, IS_SYNC, DESCRIPTION, STATUS, JOB_CLASS, START_AT, END_AT, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATE, ID ) VALUES (
#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aliasName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobTrigger,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cronExpression,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isSync,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser.userName}, sysdate, #{id} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE JOB_QUARTZ_CONF
REMARKS=#{remarks},
DEL_FLAG=#{delFlag},
JOB_NAME=#{jobName},
ALIAS_NAME=#{aliasName},
JOB_GROUP=#{jobGroup},
JOB_TRIGGER=#{jobTrigger},
CRON_EXPRESSION=#{cronExpression},
IS_SYNC=#{isSync},
DESCRIPTION=#{description},
STATUS=#{status},
JOB_CLASS=#{jobClass},
START_AT=#{startAt},
END_AT=#{endAt},
UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser.userName}, UPDATE_DATE = sysdate, ID = #{id}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM JOB_QUARTZ_CONF WHERE id IN
#{listId}
